author: sky.cactus
content: <@!425279588009246720> Do you know what the code at https://etherscan.io/address/0xca7bf67ab492b49806e24b6e2e4ec105183caa01 does?

author: sky.cactus
content: Also, given that there are only 3 contracts that start with `0xEF` and two of them have (in theory) reachable owners/authors and the third doesn't actually *do* anything, I think we should explore the option of an irregular state change to get rid of them so we have a completely clear EF space.

author: sky.cactus
content: This is especially true since all 3 of them were created after EIP-3541 was proposed, and I suspect at least two of them (the contracts that merely deployed 0xEF) were created explicitly to cause problems for us.

author: sky.cactus
content: Hmm, I should probably discuss this in the discussions-to link.
